revision.text: {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Professor Birch || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Littleroot Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Professor Birch's Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Littleroot Town]] || Tells the player about updates to the Hatchery Queue. |- | Tracking Scientist || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Oldale Town]] || Tells the player about the Roaming nature of Latios and Latias. |- | Reporter Gabby || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Slateport City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | Professor Cozmo || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fallarbor Town]] || Informs the player about [[Battle Frontier|Deoxys]]. |- | Weatherman || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fortree City]] || Informs the player about the several forms of Castform. |- | Astronomer || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Mossdeep City]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Jirachi. |- | Big Spender || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|LilyCove City]] || Teaches the player about Shop amount button. |- | Diver || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Pacifidlog Town]] || Teaches the player about Dungeon Loot rates increasing with clears |- | Gym Leader Wallace || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Sootopolis City]] || Tells the player about the [[Cave of Origin|location]] and [[Gyms#Pok√©mon League Hoenn|requirement]] needed to unlock Groudon and Kyogre. |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
